original_text: At that time it was not safe to travel very far. There was too much trouble among the people of other countries.
korean_text: 그 때에 온 땅의 모든 주민이 크게 요란하여 사람의 출입이 평안하지 못하며

sentences.original_text: it was not safe to travel very far
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 멀리 여행하는 것은 안전하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: among the people of other countries
